line.text: In Sword, to reach an 'underground exit' object and activate it in order to allow agents of simulation to use it (the agents will be able to get in, get out and travel using the given underground network object).
Lines used by units to adapt their behavior when they reach or cross them.

The agent moves toward the given underground exit. If it is not reachable (the object is located inside an urban block within which the agent cannot move), the agent moves as close as possible. Average speed depends on the physical capabilities, taking into account terrain properties.

Upon reaching the underground exit, the agent simply activates it. The report "the underground exit has been activated" is displayed. The object status should switch from "activated: No" to "Activated: Yes" (see screenshot below).
Upon action termination, the agent moves to the meeting position.
